entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
